summary: This memo discusses the establishment of official cover backstopping for Guy Vitate, utilizing the U.S. Army Element, Joint Operations Group. It outlines procedures for managing his Unit ID card and coordinating changes in his headquarters status with the Official Cover and Liaison Section, CCD.
title: VITATE, Guy, Establishment of Official Cover Backstop
sender: JOSEPH M. ADAMS, Chief, Official Cover & Liaison, CCD
